column1: Settimo Torinese (Piedmontese: Ël Seto) is a comune in the Metropolitan City of Turin
column4: and it comes from the comune's distance from Turin
column5: which is seven Roman miles. It is bordered by the other comuni of Leinì

column1: Sights include the Tower of Settimo
column2: the last remains of the medieval castle (13th–14th centuries) mostly destroyed in the 16th century wars.
